verblex: 1. Of a particular emotion, to experience it; or to be aware that something is touching or happening to your body. English = sense, feel.
2. To think that something is probably the case, but without being sure. English = feel. Idiomatic English = have the impression.
nomlex: 1. The physical ability to feel things on your skin. English = touch.
2. Your emotions, attitudes or physical sensations that you experience. English = feelings.
3. The vague idea that something is probably the case, but without being sure. English = impression.
